sentences.en: an operation to enlarge her breasts
Can you enlarge on what has already been said?
sentences.cn: 你能把所说的事再详尽地说说 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you enlarge this photograph for me?
sentences.cn: 你能帮我把这张照片放大 吗 ?

sentences.en: Could you enlarge upon your suggestion?
sentences.cn: 你能不能详细谈谈你的建议.

sentences.en: Different states or groups can combine to enlarge their markets.
sentences.cn: 不同的州或企业集团可以联合起来以扩大市场。

sentences.en: I asked the photographer to enlarge the picture.
sentences.cn: 我请摄影师把那张照片放大.

sentences.en: I need not enlarge on this matter; you all know my views.
sentences.cn: 关于此事我不必详述, 你们都知道我的意见.

sentences.en: I wish to enlarge upon a statement made by Gary Docking.
sentences.cn: 我想就加里·多金的话再展开说一下。

sentences.en: I would like to enlarge on this theme.
sentences.cn: 我想就这一主题进行详述。

sentences.en: Make thy love larger to enlarge my worth.
sentences.cn: 听着这话,我要从羞愧中站起./扩大些你的爱,好提高些我的价值.

sentences.en: Police will have the pictures enlarged in an attempt to identify the thief.
sentences.cn: 为了确认窃贼的身份，警方会将这些照片放大。

sentences.en: She began to enlarge upon the subject.
sentences.cn: 她开始就这个题目大肆发挥.

sentences.en: The gallery is seeking to enlarge its holdings of Danish art.
sentences.cn: 画廊正在寻求增加丹麦艺术作品的馆藏.

sentences.en: The glands in the neck may enlarge.
There are plans to enlarge the recreation area.
sentences.cn: 已经有了扩大娱乐场地的计划。

sentences.en: This book is intended to enlarge vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 这本书的目的是为了扩大词汇量。

sentences.en: This photograph is too small, please enlarge it for me.
sentences.cn: 这张照片太小, 请把它给我放大.

sentences.en: This photograph won't probably enlarge well.
sentences.cn: 这张照片放大出来很可能效果不好.

sentences.en: Workmen were hired to remodel and enlarge the farm buildings.
sentences.cn: 雇用了工人来改造和扩建农场建筑。

words.tran_cn: 放大；放大的照片；增补物
[摄] 放大机；扩大者；增补者

trans.tran_cn: 扩大，增大，放大，详细说明
trans.tran_en: if you enlarge something, or if it enlarges, it increases in size or scale
if you enlarge something, or if it enlarges, it increases in size or scale
